mapper.select: SELECT tt.id, tt.teacherAccount, tt.teacherPwd, tt.teacherPhone, tt.teacherName, tt.teacherInfo, tt.instId, tt.email, tt.jieshao, tt.companyLogo, tt.zy, tt.chec FROM t_teacher tt where 1 = 1 order by tt.chec limit #{page},#{limit}
SELECT ti.id, ti.account, ti.instName, ti.email, ti.instInfo, ti.information, ti.`start` FROM t_institutions ti WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY ti.`start` limit #{page},#{limit}
